questions.question: Each gamete contains a …..…… number of …..….. chromosomes.
questions.explanation: Gametes are haploid cells, meaning they contain 23 chromosomes.

questions.question: During meiosis, one ………..... gives rise to four daughter cells, each with 22 plus 1 X chromosomes.
questions.explanation: The primary oocyte undergoes meiosis, producing four haploid cells.
